Plot: Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a high-powered laser for a university project. When their professor intends to turn their work into a military weapon, they decide to ruin his plans.
Title: Real Genius
Actors: Val Kilmer, Gabriel Jarret, Michelle Meyrink, William Atherton
Writer: Neal Israel (screenplay), Neal Israel (story), Pat Proft (screenplay), Pat Proft (story), Pj Torokvei
